backpack.name: Backpack
backpack.description: A leather backpack with straps and buckles. Can hold up to 400 gp of weight.

grappling_hook.name: Grappling Hook
grappling_hook.description: An iron hook with multiple prongs for securing ropes.

crowbar.name: Crowbar
crowbar.description: An iron bar for prying open doors or containers. +2 bonus to force doors.

hammer.name: Hammer
hammer.description: A small hammer for driving spikes and pitons.

piton.name: Iron Spike/Piton
piton.description: An iron spike for securing ropes or wedging doors.

torch.name: Torch
torch.description: A wooden stick wrapped in oil-soaked cloth. Burns for 1 hour (6 turns).

lantern_hooded.name: Lantern, Hooded
lantern_hooded.description: An oil-burning lantern with a hood. Burns for 4 hours per flask of oil.

lantern_bullseye.name: Lantern, Bullseye
lantern_bullseye.description: A directional lantern with focused beam. Burns for 4 hours per flask of oil.

oil_flask.name: Oil, Flask (1 pint)
oil_flask.description: A flask of lamp oil. Burns for 4 hours in a lantern. Can be used as a weapon (thrown, 1d8 fire damage if lit).

waterskin.name: Waterskin
waterskin.description: A leather skin for carrying water or wine. Holds 1 quart when full.

sack_small.name: Sack, Small
sack_small.description: A small cloth or leather sack. Can hold up to 200 gp of weight.

sack_large.name: Sack, Large
sack_large.description: A large cloth or leather sack. Can hold up to 600 gp of weight.

chest.name: Chest
chest.description: A wooden chest with iron bands and a lock.

pouch_belt.name: Pouch, Belt
pouch_belt.description: A small leather pouch worn on the belt. Can hold up to 50 gp of weight.

rations_standard.name: Rations, Standard (per day)
rations_standard.description: One day's worth of preserved food (dried meat, hard bread, cheese).

rations_iron.name: Rations, Iron (per day)
rations_iron.description: One day's worth of dried rations. Lasts 3 months without spoiling.

trail_rations.name: Trail Rations (per week)
trail_rations.description: One week's worth of trail rations for wilderness travel.

ale_quart.name: Ale (per quart)
ale_quart.description: A quart of common ale or beer.

clothing_common.name: Clothing, Common
clothing_common.description: A set of common clothes (tunic, breeches, simple shoes).

clothing_fine.name: Clothing, Fine
clothing_fine.description: A set of fine clothes suitable for nobility.

boots.name: Boots
boots.description: A sturdy pair of leather boots.

boots_riding.name: Boots, Riding
boots_riding.description: High leather boots designed for riding.

thieves_tools.name: Thieves' Tools
thieves_tools.description: A set of lockpicks, files, and other tools for thiefwork. Required for picking locks and disarming traps.

healers_kit.name: Healer's Kit
healers_kit.description: Bandages, herbs, and medical tools. Grants +2 bonus to healing checks.

mining_pick.name: Mining Pick
mining_pick.description: A heavy iron pick for mining and digging through stone.

shovel.name: Shovel
shovel.description: A wooden-handled shovel with iron blade.

holy_symbol_wood.name: Holy Symbol, Wooden
holy_symbol_wood.description: A wooden holy symbol. Required for clerics to turn undead.

holy_symbol_silver.name: Holy Symbol, Silver
holy_symbol_silver.description: A silver holy symbol. Required for clerics to turn undead.

holy_water.name: Holy Water, Vial
holy_water.description: A vial of blessed water. Deals 2d4 damage to undead when thrown.

mirror_small.name: Mirror, Small Steel
mirror_small.description: A small polished steel mirror. Useful for seeing around corners or detecting certain monsters.

pole_10ft.name: Pole, 10 feet
pole_10ft.description: A 10-foot wooden pole. Useful for probing for traps or testing floors.

chain_10ft.name: Chain, 10 feet
chain_10ft.description: 10 feet of iron chain. Stronger than rope.

lock_good.name: Lock, Good
lock_good.description: A high-quality lock with key. Difficult to pick (-10% to thief skill).

lock_poor.name: Lock, Poor
lock_poor.description: A simple lock with key. Easy to pick (+10% to thief skill).

manacles.name: Manacles
manacles.description: Iron shackles with a lock. Used to restrain prisoners.

candle.name: Candle
candle.description: A wax candle. Burns for 1 hour. Provides dim light.

chalk.name: Chalk
chalk.description: A piece of chalk for marking walls and doors.

parchment.name: Parchment (per sheet)
parchment.description: A sheet of parchment for writing.

ink_vial.name: Ink, Vial
ink_vial.description: A vial of black ink for writing.

spellbook_blank.name: Spellbook, Blank
spellbook_blank.description: A blank spellbook with 100 pages. Required for magic-users to record spells.

scroll_case.name: Scroll Case
scroll_case.description: A leather or wooden tube for storing scrolls and maps.

bedroll.name: Bedroll
bedroll.description: A blanket and sleeping mat rolled together.

tinderbox.name: Tinderbox (flint & steel)
tinderbox.description: Flint, steel, and tinder for starting fires.

whetstone.name: Whetstone
whetstone.description: A stone for sharpening bladed weapons.

fishing_net_25ft.name: Fishing Net, 25 sq. ft.
fishing_net_25ft.description: A fishing net, 5 feet by 5 feet.

barrel.name: Barrel
barrel.description: A wooden barrel for storing liquids or goods. Holds 40 gallons.

bottle_glass.name: Bottle, Glass
bottle_glass.description: A glass bottle with a cork stopper.

horn_signal.name: Signal Horn
horn_signal.description: A horn for signaling. Can be heard up to 1 mile away.

wolfsbane.name: Wolfsbane (bunch)
wolfsbane.description: A bunch of wolfsbane herb. Repels lycanthropes.

garlic.name: Garlic (bunch)
garlic.description: A bunch of garlic. Repels vampires.

horse_riding.name: Horse, Riding
horse_riding.description: A standard riding horse. Movement 24", can carry up to 3000 gp weight.

horse_war.name: Horse, War (Heavy)
horse_war.description: A heavy warhorse trained for combat. Movement 18", can carry up to 4000 gp weight.

pony.name: Pony
pony.description: A small pony. Movement 12", can carry up to 2000 gp weight.

mule.name: Mule
mule.description: A pack mule. Movement 12", can carry up to 2000 gp weight.

cart.name: Cart
cart.description: A two-wheeled cart. Requires horse or mule to pull. Can carry up to 4000 gp weight.

wagon.name: Wagon
wagon.description: A four-wheeled wagon. Requires 2 horses or 4 mules to pull. Can carry up to 15000 gp weight.
